expo.name: Track Flow
expo.description: Track Flow helps small businesses efficiently manage stock, streamline supplier relationships, and create professional invoices. Ideal for micro and small enterprises, it offers real-time inventory tracking, low-stock alerts, and integrates seamlessly with WhatsApp for quick quotations and invoices.
